001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Intent;
004import androidx.activity.result.ActivityResult;
005import androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultLauncher;
006import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
007import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
008import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
009import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
010import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
011import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
012import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount;
013import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service.GoogleSignInService;
015import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
016import javax.inject.Inject;
017
018/**
019 * ViewModel class for managing Google Sign-In operations.
020 */
021@HiltViewModel
022public class LoginViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
023
024  private final GoogleSignInService signInService;
025  private final MutableLiveData<GoogleSignInAccount> account;
026  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
027  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
028
029  /**
030   * Constructs a LoginView Model.
031   *
032   * @param signInService The GoogleSignInService used to perform sign-in operations.
033   */
034  @Inject
035  LoginViewModel(GoogleSignInService signInService) {
036    this.signInService = signInService;
037    account = new MutableLiveData<>();
038    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
039    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
040    refresh();
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public void onStop(@NonNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
045    pending.clear();
046    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Returns the LiveData containing the signed-in account data.
051   * @return LiveData that emits the signed-in account data.
052   */
053  public LiveData<GoogleSignInAccount> getAccount() {
054    return account;
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Returns the LiveData containing any errors caused by sign-in operations.
059   * @return LiveData that emits any throwable errors.
060   */
061  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
062    return throwable;
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Refreshes the bearer token and updates the account data.
067   */
068  public void refresh(){
069    throwable.setValue(null);
070    signInService
071        .refresh()
072        .subscribe(
073            this.account::postValue,
074            this.throwable::postValue,
075            pending
076        );
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Initiates the Google sign-in process.
081   * @param launcher The launcher to start the sign-in intent.
082   */
083  public void startSignIn(ActivityResultLauncher<Intent> launcher) {
084    signInService.startSignIn(launcher);
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Completes the Google sign-in process.
089   * @param result The ActivityResult of the sign-in process.
090   */
091  public void completeSignIn(ActivityResult result) {
092    throwable.setValue(null);
093    signInService
094        .completeSignIn(result)
095        .subscribe(
096            account::postValue,
097            throwable::postValue,
098            pending
099        );
100  }
101
102  /**
103   * Signs out the user who is currently signed in.
104   */
105  public void signOut() {
106    throwable.setValue(null);
107    signInService
108        .signOut()
109        .doFinally(() -> account.postValue(null))
110        .subscribe(
111            () -> {},
112            throwable::postValue,
113            pending
114        );
115  }
116
117}
